Description: Polished red ware pottery double flask with rounded bases; blackened.
Curator's comments: Published: A. Roveri and F. Tiradritte [eds.], Kemet: Alle Sorgenti del Tempo, Ravenna 1998, p.167 [76].
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (pl. xxxiv.16)
Exhibition history: 2012, Apr-Aug. New York, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, Art of Early Egypt.
